author: cnbc.com
title: Dollarama to Report Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2018 Results
text:
MONTREAL, March 1, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Dollarama Inc. (TSX: DOL) will release its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended January 28, 2018, on Thursday, March 29, 2018, at 7:00 a.m. (ET).
Management will hold a conference call on the same day to discuss the results. Investors and financial analysts are invited to ask questions. Media may participate in the call on a listenâ€‘only basis.
Call Details:
Thursday, March 29, 2018 at 10:30 a.m. (ET)
Dial-in number: (514) 392-1478 or (866) 223-7781
Conference call replay (available until April 29, 2018)
(514) 861-2272 or (800) 408-3053
Access code 2684236#
About Dollarama
Dollarama is a recognized Canadian value retailer offering a broad assortment of everyday consumer products, general merchandise and seasonal items. Our 1,135 locations across Canada provide customers with compelling value in convenient locations, including metropolitan areas, mid-sized cities and small towns. Our quality merchandise is sold in individual or multiple units at select, fixed price points up to $4.00.
www.dollarama.com
SOURCE Dollarama Inc.
